title: Decision
description:
Jun, the third-generation heir of a chaebol. 
It was one of those days, in the midst of a period of ennui, where Jun felt he may go mad with boredom. While hanging out with his friends in a bar’s “hidden room” and starting the day with “fun” (drinking and playing around with girls), Jun sat in a daze, pondering the difference between life and death. At that moment, a waiter entered the room, and the heart Jun believed to be dead leap back to life.
